Renamed to `precision_at_k`, please use that method instead. (deprecated)

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/metrics/sparse_precision_at_k"><code>tf.compat.v1.metrics.sparse_precision_at_k</code></a>


``` python
tf.metrics.sparse_precision_at_k(
    labels,
    predictions,
    k,
    class_id=None,
    weights=None,
    metrics_collections=None,
    updates_collections=None,
    name=None
)
```
